revised_title: Surgical Restoration of Urethra: A Pioneering Case Study
tldr: This article narrates a case study of a man who suffered extensive damage to his urethra and underwent a series of innovative surgical procedures to restore its function. The operations involved using healthy skin and tissue to create a new canal, connecting the separated portions of the urethra. The patient eventually recovered and regained his ability to expel the contents of his bladder.
